channel.title: [PI]manifest error issues with main class-help?
channel.description:
ive jar'd my client, i wanna release it, its PI, i used jar maker, set the main-class to :client and i get this error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: class Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: class at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: class. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
[/code] i know this is a common issue, so should be an easy fix, but i cannot get it to work.. help?

item.title: [PI]manifest error issues with main class-help?
item.dc:creator: @helloimwhite helloimwhite
item.description:
@helloimwhite wrote:

ive jar’d my client, i wanna release it, its PI, i used jar maker, set the main-class to :client and i get this error

[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: class
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: class
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: class. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code] i know this is a common issue, so should be an easy fix, but i cannot get it to work… help?
